name: Future in Ruins
description:
Welcome to Future In Ruins, a platformer game where you play the role of an explorer who has dived into a long-forgotten research facility in order to recover the secrets of a glorious past. What challenges awaits you amongst the rubble? What long forgotten relics will you find along the way? And most of all...

...does the future truly lies amongst the ruins?

Heya! This is a prototype of the game we made for our thesis project. After playing this game, we'd like to know your thoughts by  answering this survey:  https://forms.gle/amdVPjmE151UGWwz5

We'd also like to thank the following for providing us the assets needed to help develop this game:

  • Cuboom
  • wewwuworks 
  •  kenney.nl 
  •  Synty
  • Quaternius
  • Keith at Fertile Soil Productions
  • Infima Games

  • Chris Nolet

  • felixyadomi
  • KeyKrusher
  • Sergenious
  • jacksonacademyashmore
  • Bogart VGM
  • AntumDeluge
  • musmaster
  • Inspector
  • Trevor Lentz
  • Alexander Zhelanov

Fontstyle: Raymond Larabie

Should there be any trouble while playing the game, you may also contact us through the comments section below.

Thank you for checking out our game, and we look forward to your warm responses!
